html: A woman who works full-time, year-round typically loses $406,760 over a 40-yr career because of the gender pay gap... Yes, still, in 2019. But not for long. text:
A woman who works full-time, year-round typically loses $406,760 over a 40-yr career because of the gender pay gap... Yes, still, in 2019.

But not for long. Today, @HouseDemocrats will pass the #PaycheckFairness Act. Because equal work deserves equal pay. #WomensHistoryMonthpic.twitter.com/AOso63JPH1

html: BREAKING: The House just passed #HR1112, the Enhanced Background Checks Act, to close the Charleston Loophole. Since 1998, the loophole has put over 60,000 guns in the hands of prohibited gun owners. We must now call on the Senate to pass this life saving legislation.
text:
BREAKING: The House just passed #HR1112, the Enhanced Background Checks Act, to close the Charleston Loophole.

Since 1998, the loophole has put over 60,000 guns in the hands of prohibited gun owners.

We must now call on the Senate to pass this life saving legislation.

html: Welcome to 2019. Today, the Congressional Black Caucus swears in the largest number of members in its history- 55. 9 members will serve in leadership in the 116th Congress. 5 members will serve as full House committee chairs. Time to get to work.pic.twitter.com/067Uiqr9Sm
text:
Welcome to 2019.

Today, the Congressional Black Caucus swears in the largest number of members in its history- 55.

9 members will serve in leadership in the 116th Congress.

5 members will serve as full House committee chairs.

Time to get to work.pic.twitter.com/067Uiqr9Sm

BREAKING: @RepSwalwell and I just made a motion in House Intel Committee to subpoena the American interpreter during the summit — the only witness to Trump’s meeting with Putin. This is an extraordinary remedy, but Trump’s actions necessitate it.

Republicans voted it down.

html: Social security isn’t an “entitlement” when Americans have been paying into the program for their whole lives. When there are seniors in this country living off $12,000 per year social security, it's clear that rather than cutting benefits, we should be expanding them.
text: Social security isn’t an “entitlement” when Americans have been paying into the program for their whole lives. When there are seniors in this country living off $12,000 per year social security, it's clear that rather than cutting benefits, we should be expanding them.

html: Louise Slaughter was unlike any person I've ever met. Her unique combination of fearless strength, a sharp sense of humor, and deep compassion for her constituents and colleagues will be dearly missed. An incredible loss for the country & all who had the privilege of knowing her.

html: I'm saddened to learn of the passing of Congresswoman Louise Slaughter. It was an honor to serve in Congress alongside a trailblazer and strong advocate for women and working families. My prayers are with her family.

html: Rep. @louiseslaughter’s passing is a huge loss. She was a groundbreaking leader & spirited representative for NY-25. Among her many accomplishments was the STOCK Act, a consequential bill requiring greater transparency of federal officials. She was a trailblazer & will be missed.
text: Rep. @louiseslaughter’s passing is a huge loss. She was a groundbreaking leader & spirited representative for NY-25. Among her many accomplishments was the STOCK Act, a consequential bill requiring greater transparency of federal officials. She was a trailblazer & will be missed.

html: The passing of Congresswoman Louise Slaughter leaves a tremendous void, not only in Congress, but among her family and friends. Our deepest and most sincere condolences to her loved ones from all of us.
